item.title:
Only additional worry I had is that ecDNA could be used to "store" resistance.
e.g. Drug A targets Gene A, but if Gene A is placed on ecDNA, it may survive elimination. Then when Drug B targets Gene B, Gene A could be reactivated from ecDNA for its beneficial use.
